bio: Our Cyber Expert Team curates awareness tips based on real-time scam alerts and digital hygiene practices.
question: How to verify if a link sent by India Post is fake?
answer: Always go to the official India Post tracking page. Do not click links with misspellings or non-gov.in domains.
